T02D2263:26b-1: do ha ko sha n'a ma tsarya g'i ti /
T02D2263:26b-3: do ha mdzod ces bya ba spyod pa'i glu /
T02D2263:26b-5: bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2263:26b-6: ji ltar rlung gis brgyab pas mi g-yo ba'i //
T02D2263:26b-7: chu la g-yo bas rab rlabs rnams su 'gyur //
T02D2263:27a-1: rgyal pos mda' bsnun snang ba yang //
T02D2263:27a-2: gcig nyid na yang rnam pa sna tshogs byed //
T02D2263:27a-3: ji ltar rmongs pas bzlog nas bltas pa yis //
T02D2263:27a-4: mar me gcig nyid gnyis su snang ba ltar //
T02D2263:27a-5: de la bltas bya lta byed gnyis med la //
T02D2263:27a-6: kye ma blo ni gnyis kyi dngos por snang //
T02D2263:27a-7: khyim du mar me mang po sbar gyur kyang //
T02D2263:27a-8: mig med pa la mun par gnas pa ltar //
T02D2263:27a-9: lhan cig skyes pas thams cad khyab byas kyang //
T02D2263:27a-10: nye yang rmongs pa dag la shin du ring //
T02D2263:27a-11: chu bo sna tshogs pa yang rgya mtsho gcig nyid dang //
T02D2263:27a-12: brdzun pa du ma dag kyang bden pa gcig gis 'joms //
T02D2263:27a-13: nyi ma gcig dang snang bar gyur pa yis //
T02D2263:27a-14: mun pa du ma dag kyang 'joms par byed //
T02D2263:27a-15: ji ltar chu 'dzin gyis ni rgya mtsho las //
T02D2263:27a-16: chu blangs nas ni sa gzhi gang byas kyang //
T02D2263:27a-17: de ni ma nyams nam mkha' dag dang mnyam //
T02D2263:27a-18: 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa dag kyang med //
T02D2263:27a-19: rgyal ba'i phun sum tshogs pas yongs gang ba'i //
T02D2263:27a-20: lhan cig skyes pa gcig gi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2263:27a-21: de las 'gro ba skye zhing 'gag pa ste //
T02D2263:27a-22: de la dngos dang dngos po med pa'ang med //
T02D2263:27a-23: dam pa'i bde ba spangs nas gzhan du 'gro //
T02D2263:27a-24: rkyen las skyes pa'i bde la re bar byed //
T02D2263:27a-25: rang gi khar bcug sbrang rtsi nye ba ni //
T02D2263:27a-26: 'thung bar mi byed shin du ring bar 'gyur //
T02D2263:27a-27: byol song dag gis sdug bsngal mi byed la //
T02D2263:27a-28: mkhas pa dag gis de la sdug bsngal byed //
T02D2263:27a-29: cig shos nam mkha'i bdud rtsi 'thung bar byed //
T02D2263:27a-30: gzhan ni yul rnams dag la'ang rnam par chags //
T02D2263:27a-31: bshang ba'i srin bu dri la chags pa ni //
T02D2263:27a-32: tsandan dag la dri ngan dag tu sems //
T02D2263:27a-33: ji ltar mya ngan 'das pa spangs nas ni //
T02D2263:27a-34: srid pa'i 'byung gnas mthug pos chags par byed //
T02D2263:27a-35: ba lang rkang rjes chu yis gang byas kyang ;
T02D2263:27a-36: / ji ltar de yang skam par 'gyur ba bzhin //
T02D2263:27a-37: phun tshogs ma yin phun tshogs brtan pa'i sems //
T02D2263:27a-38: yang na phun sum tshogs pa skam par 'gyur //
T02D2263:27a-39: ji ltar rgya mtsho ba tsha can gyi chu //
T02D2263:27a-40: chu 'dzin kha yis blangs pas dngar bar 'gyur //
T02D2263:27b-0: brtan pa'i sems @27b kyis gzhan gyi don byed pa //
T02D2263:27b-1: yul gyi dug kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2263:27b-2: brjod du med na sdug bsngal ma yin te //
T02D2263:27b-3: bsgom du med na de nyid bde ba yin //
T02D2263:27b-4: ji ltar 'brug gi sgra yis sngangs na yang //
T02D2263:27b-5: char pa bab pas lo tog smin par byed //
T02D2263:27b-6: dang po tha ma de bzhin gzhan na med //
T02D2263:27b-7: thog ma tha ma bar du gnas pa med //
T02D2263:27b-8: kun du rtog pas rmongs pa'i yid can la //
T02D2263:27b-9: stong pa dang ni snying rje brjod pas so //
T02D2263:27b-10: ji ltar me tog nang gnas sbrang rtsi ni //
T02D2263:27b-11: bung ba nyid kyis shes par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2263:27b-12: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa mi 'dor ro //
T02D2263:27b-13: rmongs pa dag gis ji ltar yos su shes //
T02D2263:27b-14: ji ltar me long ngos kyi bzhin gyi gzugs //
T02D2263:27b-15: rmongs pa mi shes pa yis bltas pa ltar //
T02D2263:27b-16: de ltar bden pa spangs pa'i sems 'di ni //
T02D2263:27b-17: mi bden pa la mang du brten par byed //
T02D2263:27b-18: me tog dri ni gzugs su med na yang//
T02D2263:27b-19: mngon sum kun du khyab par byed pa ltar //
T02D2263:27b-20: de bzhin gzugs su med pa'i rang bzhin gyis //
T02D2263:27b-21: dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dag kyang shes par gyis //
T02D2263:27b-22: rlung gis chu la zhugs shing dkrugs pa yis //
T02D2263:27b-23: 'jam pa'i chu yang rdo yi gzugs ltar 'gro //
T02D2263:27b-24: rtog pas dkrugs pas rmongs pa gzugs med pa //
T02D2263:27b-25: shin du sra zhing mkhregs pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2263:27b-26: sems gang dri ma med pa'i rang bzhin la //
T02D2263:27b-27: srid dang myang 'das 'dam gyis ma gos so //
T02D2263:27b-28: 'dam du bcug na mchog gi rin po che //
T02D2263:27b-29: de yi 'od kyang gsal ba ma yin no //
T02D2263:27b-30: gti mug gsal bas ye shes mi gsal te //
T02D2263:27b-31: gti mug gsal bas sdug bsngal gsal ba yin //
T02D2263:27b-32: ji ltar sa bon las ni myu gu 'byung //
T02D2263:27b-33: myu gu'i rgyu las yal ga 'byung ba'o //
T02D2263:27b-34: gcig dang du ma sems la dpyad pa yis //
T02D2263:27b-35: gsal ba spangs nas srid pa dag tu 'gro //
T02D2263:27b-36: mthong bzhin du ni dong du 'gro ba la //
T02D2263:27b-37: de las snying rje ba ni ci zhig yod //
T02D2263:27b-38: kha sbyor bde la yongs su chags nas su //
T02D2263:27b-39: 'di nyid don dam yin zhes rmongs pa smra //
T02D2263:27b-40: gang zhig khyim nas byung nas sgo drung du //
T02D2263:27b-41: k'a ma r'u pa'i gtam ni 'dri bar byed //
T02D2263:28a-2: rnam pa du ma'i tshul gyis bcos ma bas //
T02D2263:28a-3: nam mkha' las bab nyes pa dang bcas pa'i //
T02D2263:28a-4: gdung bsab rgyal bar gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
T02D2263:28a-5: ji ltar bram ze mar dang 'bras kyis ni //
T02D2263:28a-6: 'bar ba'i me la sbyin sreg byed pa ni ;
T02D2263:28a-7: / nam mkha'i bcud kyi rdzas kyis bskyed pa ste //
T02D2263:28a-8: 'di de nyid du zhen par shes pa nyid //
T02D2263:28a-9: kha cig tshangs pa'i gnas su 'od spar nas //
T02D2263:28a-10: lce yis kun du ru yis lce chung bskyod //
T02D2263:28a-11: 'ching bar byed pa shin du dkrugs byas te //
T02D2263:28a-12: nga rgyal dbang gis rnal 'byor pa zhes zer ;
T02D2263:28a-13: / rang rig de nyid rig pas gzhan la ston //
T02D2263:28a-14: gang gis bcings pa de nyid grol zhes zer //
T02D2263:28a-15: kha dog dbye bas 'ching bu margad zer //
T02D2263:28a-16: rmongs pas rin cher brtag pa ma shes pas //
T02D2263:28a-17: de ni ra gan gser gyi blo yis len //
T02D2263:28a-18: nyams myong khyer nas don dam sgrub par byed//
T02D2263:28a-19: rmi lam bde la rjes su chags par byed //
T02D2263:28a-20: phung po mi rtag ces zer //
T02D2263:28a-21: ae bam yi ger rang gis go bar byed //
T02D2263:28a-22: skad cig dbye bas phyag rgya bzhi bkod cing //
T02D2263:28a-23: nyams su myong bas lhan cig skyes pa zer //
T02D2263:28a-24: gzugs brnyan zhes pa me long lta ba bzhin //
T02D2263:28a-25: ji ltar ma rtogs smig rgyu'i chu la ni //
T02D2263:28a-26: 'khrul pa'i dbang gis ri dags rgyug par byed //
T02D2263:28a-27: rmongs pa skom pa mi ngoms 'ching bar 'gyur //
T02D2263:28a-28: gang zhig don dam zer zhing bde ba len //
T02D2263:28a-29: kun rdzob bden pa dran pa med pa ste //
T02D2263:28a-30: sems dang sems ni med par gyur pa'o //
T02D2263:28a-31: de nyid yongs su gyur pa mchog gi mchog / mchog gi dam pa grogs dag shes par gyis //
T02D2263:28a-32: sems ni dran med ting nge 'dzin du sbyor //
T02D2263:28a-33: nyon mongs yongs su dag pa'ang de nyid do //
T02D2263:28a-34: ji ltar 'dam skyes 'dam gyis mi tshugs bzhin //
T02D2263:28a-35: srid 'byung nyes pas rgyal chos mi gos so//
T02D2263:28a-36: de yang thams cad sgyu mar nges par blta bya ste //
T02D2263:28a-37: 'jig rten 'das pa skad cig len dang btang snyoms byed //
T02D2263:28a-38: brtan pa'i blo can de dag gti mug 'ching bar 'gyur //
T02D2263:28a-39: rang byung bsam gyis mi khyab rang bzhin gnas pa yin //
T02D2263:28b-0: snang 'di gsal bar dang po nyid nas ma skyes @28b te ;
T02D2263:28b-1: ; gzugs can ma yin gzugs kyi rang bzhin rnam par spangs //
T02D2263:28b-2: de nyid rgyun du gnas shing bsam gtan gcig pu byed //
T02D2263:28b-3: yid la mi byed dri med bsam gtan sems ma yin //
T02D2263:28b-4: blo dang sems dang sems kyi snang ba de bdag nyid //
T02D2263:28b-5: 'jig rten gang dag gzhan du snang ba de bdag nyid //
T02D2263:28b-6: sna tshogs ma lus mthong bya mthong byed de bdag nyid //
T02D2263:28b-7: chags sdang gti mug byang chub sems kyang de bdag nyid //
T02D2263:28b-8: gti mug mun par sgron me spar //
T02D2263:28b-9: ji srid blo yi dbye bas phye //
T02D2263:28b-10: de srid sems kyi dri ma spangs //
T02D2263:28b-11: ma zhen rang bzhin gang zhig bsam //
T02D2263:28b-12: dgag pa med cing sgrung pa med //
T02D2263:28b-13: 'dzin pa med de bsam mi khyab //
T02D2263:28b-14: blo yi dbye bas rmongs rnams 'ching //
T02D2263:28b-15: dbyer med lhan cig skyes rnam dag / gcig dang du mas rnam brtags gcig nyid min //
T02D2263:28b-16: shes pa tsam gyis 'gro ba rnam par grol //
T02D2263:28b-17: gsal ba gang zhig shes pa bsgom pa bstan //
T02D2263:28b-18: mi g-yo'i sems ni bdag nyid de ru gzung //
T02D2263:28b-19: dga' ba rgyas pa'i yul thob pa //
T02D2263:28b-20: mthong ba'i sems ni rnam par rgyas //
T02D2263:28b-21: yul la bros kyang tha dad med //
T02D2263:28b-22: dga' ba bde ba'i myu gu dang //
T02D2263:28b-23: mchog gi 'dab ma skyes pa ste //
T02D2263:28b-24: ji srid phyogs bcur mi 'phro ba //
T02D2263:28b-25: spros med bde ba'i 'bras bu nyid //
T02D2263:28b-26: gang gis gang du gang la de dag med //
T02D2263:28b-27: de yis de ru de la dgos pa byas //
T02D2263:28b-28: rjes su chags pa dang ni ma chags pa'i //
T02D2263:28b-29: gzugs nyid dag ni stong pa nyid yin no //
T02D2263:28b-30: srid pa'i 'dam zhen phag lta bu //
T02D2263:28b-31: dri med sems gyur skyon ci yod //
T02D2263:28b-32: gang yang dag gis ma gos pa //
T02D2263:28b-33: de yang de yis ci phyir 'ching //
T02D2263:28b-34: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa /
